com.team08storyapp

Class UpdateTask

  • java.lang.Object
      • com.team08storyapp.UpdateTask

  • public class UpdateTask
extends
    UpdateTask is an AsyncTask Object that performs sync function in the background.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 November 8, 2013
    Author:
    Michele Paulichuk, Alice Wu, Ana Marcu, Jarrett Toll, Jiawei Shen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UpdateTask(UpdateToolPackage updatePkg)
      Constructor of UpdateTask requires an updateToolPackage that contains all the information it needs: a FileHelper object to get the ids of stories that need to be uploaded an ESHelepr object to upload stories a Context object to instantiate a NotificationHelper object that puts up a notification in status bar

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • UpdateTask

        public UpdateTask(UpdateToolPackage updatePkg)
        Constructor of UpdateTask requires an updateToolPackage that contains all the information it needs:
          a FileHelper object to get the ids of stories that need to be uploaded
          an ESHelepr object to upload stories
          a Context object to instantiate a NotificationHelper object that puts up a notification in status bar
        Parameters:
        updatePkg - an UpdateTookPackage that contains objects (fileHelper, esHelper, context) that are from the activity where constructor is called
